dataList.dlg: Tell me... What do I need to cut?
There's nothing refreshing like swinging my sword against the morning air.
Who do you eat your lunch with, manager? Umm... As for me, I usually eat alone. It's more comfortable that way.
It's dark out. The sky would be brighter if I could cut the moon. ...I'm kidding, of course.
Are you satisfied with what you're doing, manager? Does your job fulfill you?
Oh, hi, manager! I was standing guard. You'll join me...? Mmm... Sure! Go ahead.
I envy Rodya. She never thinks too deep, and has no problem following her heart. It's something I just couldn't do.
I was taught that you should show no hesitation when you wield a sword. But I can't help but keep asking myself... if it's really okay to take others' lives so easily...
But when I actually cut someone down... I would feel a thrill. I guess that's my nature.
Huh? Where did the manager go? Is this some kind of prank?
I'll become a sharper sword.
With no hesitation.
This will help me hone my edge, right...?
Please trust my blade...
I won't hesitate...!
I'll be able to cut them down next, right?
Hng...!
I slew them!
Don't joke on me like this...
You have no hesitation!
This was inconceivable...
I was a little nervous... but it's nice to see that it ended well.
To slay others... It was more delightful than I thought.
I let my reluctance hold me back when it mattered the most. It's my fault.
